APPENDIX 2 - CROSS REFERENCE TABLE FOR ORDINANCE 1494
Chapter, article and section numbers of Ordinance 1494 are shown with the corresponding section numbers of Title 22 of the Los Angeles County Code in which they are set out. To locate the legislative history of a section (for example, Ord. 1494 § 101 — LACC § 22.12.010), check the entry for that section in Appendix 1.
